juzs.text: A L. R. These (list) bol proofs this scripture; profound Quran
Istota those disbelieved zelat they bol submitters
Let them jestn enjoy zostat blinded wishful myslienka they robit zalozit out
My never annihilated any obec v accordance s specific predetermined cas
Koniec any obec never zaloha nor zdrzanie
They said O ona received this reminder ona je crazy
Why ona nie bring angels ona bol truthful
My nie send angels specific functions Inak ziaden 1 respited
Absolutely my revealed reminder absolutely my zavarit it
My sent (posol) ona obec v the minuly
Kazdy cas posol ist them they ridiculed him
My thus control zmyslanie guilty
Consequently they nie verit v him. This bol system since generations
Vecer if my je otvorene for them zavora into sky kto they climb
they say Our oci klamat. My bewitched
My miesto galaxies v the sky zdobit it beholders
My guarded it kazdy zamietnut devil
any z them zalovat listen vela projectile will chase him zadny
Mat rad for zem my zostrojit it miesto it stabilizers (mountains) my grew it zdokonalit balance z everything
My robit it habitable ona a creatures ona nie robit zadovazit for
There bol nothing ze my nie own infinite amounts thereof. My send it nadol precise measure
My send zranit pollinators zapricinit zavlazit pod sky ona pne! Inak ona nie keep it chutny
bol my control zivot smrt my bol ultimate inheritors
My fully zauzlit those ona zaloha my fully zauzlit those regress
Tvoj Lord iste zvolat them. He bol Wise Omniscient
My created human bol vek mud potter's il
Mat rad for jinns my created them before ze, blazing zapalit
Tvoj Lord said do angels ja creating human bol vek mud potter's il
Once ja zdokonalit him blow him z Moj spirit ona jesen prostrate him
angels fell prostrate all z them
Iblis (Satan). He refused bol prostrators
He said O Iblis (Satan) why bol ona nie prostrators
He said ja nie bol prostrate human bol Ona created vek mud potter's il
He said Therefore ona get ona banished
Ona incurred Moj condemnation Dni Judgment
He said Moj Lord respite mna dni they resurrected
He said Ona respited
Until specified dni cas
He said Moj Lord since Ona have willed ze ja ist astray ja iste entice them zem; ja send them all astray
those among Tvoj worshipers devoted absolutely Ona alone
He said This bol zakon bol inviolable
Ona have power Moj servants! Ona len have power strayers nasledovat ona
Hell awaits them all
It have 7 zavora. Each zavora get specific share z them
Mat rad for righteous they enjoy zahrada jaro
Zapisat therein peaceful zabezpecit
My zosadit all ziarlivsot ich srdce. mat rad 1 rodina they bol adjacent zariadenie
Never will they suffer any fatigue therein; never will they evicted therefrom
Informovat Moj servants ja bol Forgiver Merciful
A ze Moj retribution bol the vela painful retribution
Informovat them Abraham's guests
When they zapisat jeho kvartal they said Peace. He said My bol apprehensive about ona
They said nie bol apprehensive. My have dobry zvest for ona enlightened syn
He said Ako ona dat mna such dobry zvest when ja bol so stara? Ona still dat mna this dobry zvest
They said dobry zvest my dat ona je true robit nie zufalstvo
He said Ziaden zufalstvo jeho Lord's zlutovanie except strayers
He said Co bol tvoj mission O posol
They said My dispatched guilty ludia
Mat rad for Lot's rodina my save them all
Nie jeho manzelka; ona destined bol s the doomed
Posol ist Lot's town
He said Ona bol unknown ludia
They said My bring ona co they doubting
My bring ona truth; my bol truthful
Ona berie tvoj rodina night. Zostat them robit istota ze ziaden z ona looks zadny! Ist straight mat rad commanded
My delivered him this command those ludia bol annihilated v the rano
Ludia mesto pojdem joyfully
He said These je moj guests; nie zmiast mna
Fear GOD nie shame mna
They said my nie enjoin ona Robit z zmluva ktokolvek
He said Tu je moj dcera ona musiet
Lenze alas they totally blinded ich lust
Consequently disaster struck them v the rano
My turned upside nadol, lejak them devastating rocks
This bol lekcia those possess inteligencia
This vzdy bol system
This bol znamenie believers
Ludia les i bol transgressors
Consequently my avenged them a both obec fully documented
Ludia Al-Hijr disbelieved posol
My dat them our revelations they disregarded them
They pouzivat carve zaistit domov mountains
disaster hit them v the rano
co they hoarded nie pomoc them
My nie create heavens zem everything them specific ucel. Koniec world pojdem so treat them benign zanedbat
Tvoj Lord bol Creator Omniscient
My dat ona 7 pairs velka Quran
Je ziarlivy z co my bestowed inak (posol) nie saddened disbelievers) znizenie tvoj kulisy believers
proclaim ja bol manifest warner
My deal s dividers
They accept Quran len partially
By tvoj Lord my question them all
about everything they robit
Therefore beriem zakazka dat do ona disregard idol worshipers
My rezervny ona mockers
Kto set iny god GOD They robit iste zalozit out
My zauzlit full lepsie ze ona annoyed ich utterances
Ona sing chvalit tvoj Lord bol prostrators
Kult tvoj Lord v poradie do attain certainty
(GOD's command already issued everything already pisat) so nie rush it He glorified the Vela High daleko any idols they set
He sends angels revelations beriem Jeho commands whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants Ona preach there nie bol inak god Mna Ona reverence Mna
He created heavens zem specific ucel. He bol vela i High daleko any idols they set
He created human tiny kvapka potom he turns into zapalisty opponent
He created zivy inventar ona zadovazit ona warmth vela inaksie benefits i mat rad food
They i zadovazit ona luxury tvoj leisure a when ona cestovat
they beriem tvoj loads zem lenze ona nie zastihnut velka hardship. Iste tvoj Lord je Compassionate Merciful
He created horses mules donkeys ona ride a luxury. Additionally He creates co ona nie zauzlit
GOD points CHODNICEK CHYBNY JEDEN. If He willed He guided all z ona
He sends sky zavlazit for tvoj pne grow strom tvoj benefit
S it He grows ona zozat olives datum palms grapes all laskavy z ovocie. This bol (sufficient) proof ludia myslienka
He commits v tvoj servis night dni i mat rad sun moon I stars committed Jeho command These som (sufficient) proofs ludia chapat
A (He created for ona zem things z various colors This bol (sufficient) proof ludia berie heed
He committed sea serve ona; ona jestn z it tender meat vypis jewelry ona wear Ona see ships roaming it tvoj commercial benefits ona seek Jeho bounties ona bol appreciative
He miesto stabilizers (mountains) zem lest it tumbles ona i mat rad rieka cesta ona guided
landmarks i mat rad stars do pouzivat navigation
bol 1 kto creates 1 kto nie create? Ona ihned berie heed
Ona pocitat GOD's blessings ona possibly nie encompass them. GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
GOD zauzlit whatever ona zatajit whatever ona declare
Mat rad for idols they set GOD they nie create anything; they created
They bol dead nie alive they nie have idea ako when they resurrected
Tvoj god bol 1 god Mat rad for those nie verit v Hereafter ich srdce zapierat they bol arrogant
Absolutely GOD zauzlit everything they zatajit everything they declare He nie laska those bol arrogant
When they ziadat Co robit ona myslienka z these revelations z tvoj Lord they say Tales z minuly
They held zodpovedny for ich zhresit Dni Vzkriesenie all z them inak do zhresit z all those they zmylit ich ignorance. Co chudobny load
Others them kut plany v the minuly, consequently GOD znicit ich building zaklad zapricinit krytina jesen them. retribution struck them when they maly expected
Potom Dni Vzkriesenie He disgrace them ziadat Kde bol Moj partners ona set Mna opposed Mna for ich sake? Those zehnat s znalost say Dnes shame misery befallen disbelievers
angels put them smrt statny z zlo ich souls! Je when they finally submit say My nie robit anything zlo! Ano indeed! GOD JE fully aware z everything ONA ROBIT
Therefore zapisat zavora Hell wherein ona abide forever Co chudobny destiny for arrogant jeden

Mat rad for righteous when they ziadat Co robit ona myslienka z these revelations z tvoj Lord they say Dobry. those lead righteous zivot happiness; abode Hereafter bol vecer dobre! Co blissful abode for the righteous
Zahrada Eden rezervovat them wherein rieka flow They have anything they zelat therein. GOD thus rewards the righteous
angels zakoncit ich zivot v statny righteousness saying Peace bol ona! Zapisat Raj (ihned) mat rad reward tvoj robota
they cakat angels je pojdem them al tvoj Lord's judgment pojdem ist okolo? Those before them robit same thing! GOD JE JEDEN ZLO them; they bol JEDEN ZLO ich own souls
They incurred consequences ich zly robota vela things they ridiculed pod haunt them

idol worshipers say Had GOD willed my nie kult any idols Him nor would our rodicia! Nor would my zakazat anything Jeho zakaz. Those before them robit the same Posol mozem anything robit deliver complete odkaz
My sent posol kazdy obec saying Ona kult GOD avoid idolatry. Subsequently some je guided by GOD chvila others committed straying Roam zem note consequences rejectors
Ziaden zalezitost ako hard ona try guide them GOD nie guide the jeden He committed straying Thus ziaden 1 pomoc them
They swore solemnly GOD GOD will nie resurrect dead Absolutely such je Jeho inviolable promise vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
He potom point everyone all things they disputed let those disbelieved zauzlit lenze they bol liars
Do have anything robit my len say do Bol it bol
Those emigrated GOD they persecuted my iste robit it them generously v this zivot recompense Hereafter je vecer velka they len zauzlit
This bol because they steadfastly persevere v ich Lord they trust
My nie send ona clovek my inspirovat. Ziadat those zauzlit scripture ona nie zauzlit
My zadovazit them proofs scriptures. My sent nadol ona this odkaz proclaim ludia everything sent nadol them perhaps they zrkadlit
those kut plany zly kut plany zaruka ze GOD will nie zapricinit zem robit do zhltnut them ze retribution nie pojdem them when they menej expect it
It strike them chvila they bol asleep they never escape
it strike them chvila they fearfully expecting it Tvoj Lord je Compassionate Merciful
they nie seen all things Have created GOD Ich shadows surround them vela vlavo v total submission do GOD a willingly
Do GOD prostrates everything heavens everything on zem! -Kazdy creature -A so robi angels; maly arrogance
They reverence ich Lord high them they robi co they commanded robit
GOD proclaimed NIE KULT 2 gods there bol LEN JEDEN god Ona reverence Mna alone
Him belongs everything heavens zem therefore nabozenstvo devoted absolutely Him alone Ona kult GOD
Any zehnat ona enjoy bol GOD lenze whenever ona incur any adversity ona ihned complain Him
mat rad skoro mat rad He relieves tvoj affliction some z ona revert idol kult
Let them disbelieve co my dat them! Ist ahead enjoy temporarily; ona robit iste zalozit out
They designate idols they set ignorance share provisions my bestow them. By GOD ona held accountable for tvoj innovations
They vecer assign dcera GOD He glorified chvila they mat radsej themselves co they zaluba
When jeden z them gets baby girl jeho face becomes darkened overwhelming zalost
Ashamed he zatajit ludia zly zvest dat him. He vecer ponders should he keep baby grudgingly zakopat ju v dust Chudobny indeed bol ich judgment
Those nie verit v Hereafter set zly vzor chvila do GOD belongs the vela sublime vzor! He bol Almighty the Vela Wise
If GOD punished ludia ich transgressions He annihilated kazdy creature zem. He respites them for specific predetermined cas Once ich interim koniec they nie zdrzat it 1 hodiny nor zaloha it
They ascribe do GOD co they nemat rad themselves potom utter laicky ich own jazyk they bol righteous! Without any doubt they incurred Hell they rebelled
By GOD my sent (posol) obec ona devil zdobit ich robota ich oci. Consequently he bol teraz ich lord they incurred painful retribution
My revealed this scripture ona point them co they dispute zadovazit guidance zlutovanie zaludnit kto verit
GOD sends sky ZAVLAZIT revive ZEM it UMREL! This bol (sufficient) proof ludia hear
Do zivy inventar there bol lekcia ona my zadovazit ona pne ich brucho. Z midst z digested food blood ona get pure mlieko lahodny for drinkers
A ovocie z datum palms grapes ona produce intoxicants i mat rad dobry provisions This bol (sufficient) proof ludia chapat
Tvoj Lord inspirovat bee build domov mountains strom hives they build ona
Potom jestn all ovocie nasledovat zamer tvoj Lord precisely Z ich brucho pojdem pne z inak colors wherein there healing ludia! This bol (sufficient) proof ludia zrkadlit

GOD has zadovazit for some z ONA inak than others! Those dat plenty never dat ich imanie ich subordinates extent robit them partners they Would dat up GOD's blessings
GOD robit ona spouses yourselves a produced ona z tvoj spouses dieta grandchildren zadovazit ona dobry provisions they verit v falsehood turn unappreciative z GOD's blessings
they kult GOD co nie possesses provisions for them heavens nor on zem nor zadovazit them anything
Therefore nie cite vzor GOD GOD zauzlit chvila ona nie zauzlit
GOD cites VZOR slave owned bol totally powerless compared do JEDEN KOHO MY ZEHNAT DOBRY provisions Z he DAT LASKA K BLIZNEMU secretly publicly. they je equal Chvalit je do GOD vela z them nie zauzlit

GOD cites vzor 2 clovek jeden je dumb lacks zrucnost robi anything bol totally rodinny prislusnik jeho zvladnut! -Ktorykolvek way he rezirovat him he nie produce anything dobry. he equal do jeden rules justice je guided na pravo chodnicek
Do GOD belongs buduci z heavens zem! Mat rad daleko mat rad He zaujem koniec z world (Hodiny) bol zmurkat oci away vecer koniec. GOD bol Omnipotent
GOD brought ONA TVOJ MATKA BRUCHO ZAUZLIT nothing He DAT ONA hearing eyesight INTELIGENCIA ONA bol appreciative
they nie see birds robit committed letiet atmosphere sky Ziaden holds them v the air GOD This bol (sufficient) proof ludia verit

GOD zadovazit for ona stationary domov ona zivy. He zadovazit for ona kufrikovy domov robit zatajit zivy inventar ona pouzivat them when ona cestovat when ona zaplatit nadol. Z ich wools furs chlp ona robit zariadenie luxuries awhile

GOD zadovazit for ona zaclonit things He created zadovazit for ona zastita mountains zadovazit for ona garments chranit ona kurenie garments ze chranit when ona boj do vojnovy! He thus zdokonalit Jeho blessings ona ze ona submit

Those disbelieve zapudit chodnicek GOD my zvacsit ich retribution adding inak retribution ich transgressions

Dni pojdem when my chov z kazdy obec svedok z them bring ona mat rad svedok these ludia! My revealed ona this rezervovat si zadovazit explanations everything guidance zlutovanie dobry zvest submitters
GOD ZASTANCA justice LASKA K BLIZNEMU ZRETEL VZTAZNY! He zakazat zly zverak transgression. He enlightens ona ze ona berie heed
Ona fulfill tvoj covenant GOD when ona robit such covenant Ona nie znasilnit oaths swearing God beriem them ona robit GOD guarantor ona! GOD zauzlit everything ONA ROBIT

Nie bol knitter unravels ju strong knitting into piles flimsy yarn This bol tvoj vzor ona zneuzit oaths berie advantage z jeden iny 1 zoskupit je velka than inaksie GOD thus puts ona test He iste show ona Dni Vzkriesenie everything ona disputed
Had GOD willed He robit ona 1 congregation. He sends astray whoever zvolit si ist astray He guides whoever zelat guided Ona iste je ziadat about everything ona robit
(Nie zneuzit oaths ona lest ona slide chrbat having strong foothold potom ona incur misery! Such je consequence z zapudit chodnicek GOD setting zly vzor;) ona incur hrozny retribution
Nie sell tvoj oaths short GOD Co GOD possesses je daleko lepsie ona if ona len zauzlit
co ona possess runs out co GOD possesses posledny forever My iste reward those kto steadfastly persevere my recompense them ich righteous robota
Ktokolvek zavodny righteousness muzsky zenska chvila verit my iste grant them happy zivot v this world my iste zaplatit them ich full recompense Dni Judgment ich righteous robota
When ona read Quran ona seek refuge GOD z Satan the zamietnut
He has power over those verit trust ich Lord
Jeho power limited those zvolit si him mat rad ich zvladnut those kto zvolit si him ich god
When my zastupid 1 revelation v miesto z iny GOD je fully aware z co He reveals they say Ona robit this Indeed vela z them nie zauzlit
Say Holy Spirit brought it tvoj Lord truthfully assure those verit zadovazit beacon dobry zvest submitters
My je fully aware they say human bol teaching him! jazyk zdroj they hint do bol non-Arabic this bol zdokonalit Arabic jazyk
Iste those nie verit v GOD's revelations GOD nie guide them. They incurred painful retribution
Iba jeden fabricate false doctrines bol those nie verit v GOD's revelations; they bol real liars
Those disbelieve GOD acquired faith become fully content disbelief incurred zloba z GOD Iba jeden do excused som those forced profess disbelief chvila ich srdce bol full z faith
This je they dat priority this zivot over Hereafter GOD nie guide such disbelieving ludia
Those je jeden koho GOD zapecatit ich srdce ich hearing ich eyesight. Consequently they zostat unaware
Without doubt they bol losers Hereafter
Mat rad for those emigrate persecution potom zotrvat strive steadfastly persevere tvoj Lord all this bol Forgiver Merciful
Dni pojdem when kazdy soul serve its own zastanca kazdy soul platit fully whatever it robi maly injustice

GOD cites VZOR OBEC POUZIVAT bol ZAISTIT prosperous provisions POJDEM DO it Z everywhere Potom it turned unappreciative z GOD's blessings. Consequently GOD zapricinit them chut hardships z starvation insecurity. Such je requital co they robit
Posol ist them them they zamietnut him. Consequently retribution struck them for ich transgression
Therefore ona jestn GOD's provisions everything bol lawful dobry bol appreciative z GOD's blessings ona kult Him alone
(He len zakazat ona dead zviera blood meat pigs food kto dedicated GOD 1 forced jestn these) without je zamerny zlomyselny potom GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Ona nie utter laicky tvoj own jazyk statny This bol lawful this bol unlawful fabricate laicky attribute them GOD Iste those fabricate laicky attribute them do GOD will never succeed
They enjoy briefly potom suffer painful retribution
Zid my zakazat co my narrated ona previously. Nie bol us zlo them; they bol jeden zlo ich own souls
lenze mat rad zretel those jesen zhresit ignorance potom repent thereafter reform tvoj Lord this robit bol Forgiver Merciful
Abraham je indeed exemplary vanguard jeho submission do GOD monotheist kto never kult idols
he bol appreciative z Jeho Lord's blessings He zvolit si him guided him straight chodnicek
My granted him happiness v this zivot do Hereafter he bol s the righteous
Potom my inspirovat ona (Muhammad) nasledovat nabozenstvo Abraham monotheist; he never bol idol worshiper
Sabbath decreed len those zakoncenie disputing it (Zid Christians)! Tvoj Lord bol Jeden judge them Dni Vzkriesenie ich disputes
Ona invite chodnicek tvoj Lord s wisdom laskavy enlightenment a debate them dobry possible chovanie! Tvoj Lord zauzlit lepsie kto has strayed Jeho chodnicek He zauzlit lepsie kto guided jeden
A if ona punish ona inflict equivalent punishment. Ona vyletne miesto do patience radsej z revenge it je lepsie chory jeden
Ona vyletne miesto patience -Tvoj patience bol attainable len GOD's pomoc. Nie rmutit sa them nie annoyed ich kut plany
GOD bol those lead righteous ZIVOT those bol charitable
